catalogEntries.title: Battle Bundle
catalogEntries.description:
Season 5: Now thru Sept 25

Instantly get these items valued at over 10,000 V-Bucks.
  • “Huntress” Outfit
  • “Drift” Outfit
  • “Redline” Outfit
  • “Balloon Axe” Pickaxe
  • “Uplink” Back Bling
  • “Lanterns” Skydiving Trail
  • 2 Gliders
  • 4 Sprays
  • 70% Bonus Season Match XP
  • 20% Bonus Season Friend Match XP
  • Extra Weekly Challenges
  • Drift Progressive Challenges
  • and more!

Play to level up your Battle Pass, unlocking up to 75+ more rewards (typically takes 75 to 150 hours of play). Want it all faster? You can use V-Bucks to buy tiers any time!
  • “Ragnarok” plus 4 other outfits
  • 3 Pickaxes
  • 4 Emotes
  • 2 Gliders
  • 4 Back Blings
  • 4 Skydiving Trails
  • 11 Sprays
  • 1,300 V-Bucks
  • and so much more!

catalogEntries.title: Battle Pass
catalogEntries.description:
Season 5: Now thru Sept 25

Instantly get these items valued at over 3,500 V-Bucks.
  • Huntress Outfit
  • Drift Outfit
  • 50% Bonus Season Match XP
  • 10% Bonus Season Friend Match XP
  • Extra Weekly Challenges
  • Drift Progressive Challenges

Play to level up your Battle Pass, unlocking over 100 rewards (typically takes 75 to 150 hours of play). Want it all faster? You can use V-Bucks to buy tiers any time!
  • “Ragnarok” plus 5 other outfits
  • 4 Pickaxes
  • 5 Emotes
  • 4 Gliders
  • 5 Back Blings
  • 5 Skydiving Trails
  • 15 Sprays
  • 1,300 V-Bucks
  • and so much more!

catalogEntries.title: Weapon Llama
catalogEntries.description: What comes out is as heavy as a sack of broken glass and just as much fun to play with. Contains at least 6 safety-guaranteed items.

catalogEntries.title: Legendarna lama ze skrytki trolla
catalogEntries.description: Cały zestaw skarbów prosto ze skrytki miejscowego trolla! Zawiera przynajmniej 8 przedmiotów (na pewno nie kradzionych).

catalogEntries.title: Ulepszlama (Seasonal Sale Freebie!)
catalogEntries.description: Stara dobra lama, pełna różnych skarbów i materiałów do ulepszania. Zawiera przynajmniej 4 elementy. Jednym z nich jest na pewno rzadki przedmiot lub bohater. Ma duże szanse na ulepszenie.
